sources.name: Energy Prices- BP Statistics
sources.description:
Data published by BP Statistical Review of World Energy 2016
Link http://www.bp.com/en/global/corporate/energy-economics/statistical-review-of-world-energy.html
Retrieved 2017-06-03

Prices corrected to 2015 US$ using the Consumer Price Index for the US

Prices have been normalised to a commodity-specific index by the author where prices in 2000=100

variables.name: Oil
variables.description: Energy price index, where prices in 2000=100

variables.name: Natural Gas
variables.description: Energy price index, where prices in 2000=100

variables.name: Coal
variables.description: Energy price index, where prices in 2000=100
